text: Jorge Meléndez Ramírez (April 15, 1871 - November 22, 1953), was born to Rafael Meléndez and Mercedes Ramírez (daughter of Norberto Ramírez). His wife was Tula Mazzini, and they had three children: Jorge (who died in his youth), María de los Angeles, and Ricardo. He was the younger brother of president Carlos Meléndez. He served as 26th President of El Salvador from March 1, 1919 to March 1, 1923. Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:1871 births Category:1953 deaths Category:People from San Salvador
title: Jorge Meléndez
